DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomize , two-period , two-treatment ( single dose 7.5 mg hetrombopag fast fed ) , crossover study conduct evaluate effect high-fat meal pharmacokinetics hetrombopag mass balance study 12 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effect High-fat Meal Pharmacokinetics Hetrombopag Mass Balance Study Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy . Weight≥50 kg，19≤BMI≤28 kg/m2 . Platelet count within normal range History clinically significant illness . History alcohol drug abuse .
